ygData.subject: Re: How tall is your character?

I think Straight Shot is in the same class as Rattrap, and her beast form c=
aused her to shrink a tad.  Porcupines aren't very large creatures, just pr=
ickly little critters with sharp wits and quills.  Primus help those who ge=
t too close.

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Aug 27, 201=
1, at 8:26 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> Yup, that=
 is why I put him in the Ultra class. it is the size of TM2
> Megatron and =
Optimus Primal. Optimal Optimus, Hydras and Marauder are
> larger still tho=
ugh, especially as the last two are currently carrying
> two sparks.
> 
> B=
ut the Maximals have several Ultras on their side at the moment,
> includin=
g Rodimus - which is another reason for them to hurry and find
> out what h=
as happened to him - whether he has returned to the dark
> side or not. He =
is a powerful ally . . . or foe and could tip the
> balance one way or anot=
her.
> 
> - Preston

      <p>Yup, that is why I put him in th=

Megatron and Optimus Primal. Optim=
al Optimus, Hydras and Marauder are<br>
larger still though, especially as =
the last two are currently carrying<br>
two sparks.<br>
<br>
But the Maxima=
ls have several Ultras on their side at the moment,<br>
including Rodimus -=
 which is another reason for them to hurry and find<br>
out what has happen=
ed to him - whether he has returned to the dark<br>
side or not. He is a po=
werful ally . . . or foe and could tip the<br>
balance one way or another.<=
